sentences.en: A popular caricature of the market economy sees greed as the dominant human motivation.
sentences.cn: 对市场经济的一种常见描述,将贪婪视为人类的主要动机.

sentences.en: Caricature is the tribute that mediocrity pays to genius.
sentences.cn: 笨拙的模仿,是凡人对天才呈献的赞词.

sentences.en: He did a caricature of the old man by talking in a deep voice.
sentences.cn: 他用深沉的声调讲话,滑稽地模仿那位老人.

sentences.en: He had unfairly presented a caricature of my views.
He is a master of caricature.
He is cutting, of course, but never slips into caricature.
sentences.cn: 他的语言是尖刻的, 那毫无疑问, 但是,绝不沦为粗劣的歪曲的讽刺.

sentences.en: High marks seek warm blood + love cartoon and caricature!
His other works are symbolic almost to the point of caricature.
sentences.cn: 他的其他作品很有象征意味,简直和漫画有异曲同工之妙.

sentences.en: My giddy aunt! Look at this caricature!
NANCY PELOSI is one of those politicians who seems made for caricature.
sentences.cn: 南希.佩洛西似乎天生就是那些经常上漫画的政客之一.

sentences.en: She drew a wickedly funny caricature of the teacher.
sentences.cn: 她以老师为对象画了一幅淘气滑稽的漫画.

sentences.en: The British caricature themselves as a nation of insular xenophobes.
sentences.cn: 英国人自嘲为惧怕外族、与世隔绝的民族.

sentences.en: The lazy right - winger of caricature has been a prolific and ecumenical policymaker.
sentences.cn: 右翼 市长约翰逊懒散滑稽,但是决策成绩颇丰,赢得众人称赞.

sentences.en: The poster showed a caricature of Hitler with a devil's horns and tail.
sentences.cn: 这张招贴漫画里的希特勒长着魔鬼一样的犄角和尾巴。

sentences.en: Their destiny indicates the sharp caricature all kinds ugly phenomenon.
sentences.cn: 自己的命运,表明了尖锐的讽刺漫画的各种丑恶现象.

sentences.en: There exists a profound relationship between his theory probes and the caricature products.
sentences.cn: 他的理论探讨和漫画创作之间存在深刻的内在联系.

trans.tran_cn: 漫画，讽刺画，漫画手法，夸张讽刺的描绘，滑稽可笑的模仿
trans.tran_en: a funny drawing of someone that makes them look silly
to draw or describe someone or something in a way that makes them seem silly

trans.tran_cn: 把…画成漫画，画成漫画讽刺，用漫画手法描绘
trans.tran_en: to draw or describe someone or something in a way that makes them seem silly
